title: Cognitive Engagement Design Strategies for Remote Science Education

context.additional_context: Aimed at enhancing science knowledge acquisition and problem-solving skills applicable to real-world tasks for current practitioners

learning_goals: Learners improve cognitive engagement by over 30% using task-structuring strategies in remote environments.
Learners can apply scientific concepts to real-world cases through collaborative problem-solving activities in face-to-face sessions.
Learners periodically diagnose their cognitive engagement levels through formative assessments and develop improvement plans.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
